alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 23 at 1:20PM PDT until September 25 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SUNDAY TO 2 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Shasta Valley, including the cities of Weed, Gazelle, and Grenada. * WHEN...From 2 PM Sunday to 2 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
